# [Interview #1048: WOR Signing Report - IronCaf, Entry #30](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1048#30)

#### Outis

Are there any locations on Roshar with red stone?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.

#### Outis

Where did the redstone on Feverstone come from?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Roshar.
